answers.answer: This is a thyroid community; you'd get better response to your questions if you ask them on the pre-diabetic forum.  You can access that forum via the following link:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/Diabetes-Prevention--Pre-Diabetes/show/1393

Hi friend, have your doctor test A1c & HbA1c, most physicians use this test to determine diabetes control.From my experience, if your level is 115/141 two hrs after sugar intake, this indicates pre-diabetes.  30 min - 1 hr workout on treadmill daily, will help levels stay in check without meds.  Good luck :)
